channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: JD Vance appeals to allies for new ‘trading bloc’ that keeps Trump’s tariffs in place, secures access to rare earths
item.description: “We don’t want to ever go through what we went through a year ago,” Trump said on Monday when announcing Project Vault.

item.title: Trump’s Iran threats face ‘Obama red line’ test as White House pivots to diplomacy
item.description: Trump threatens Iran with military action while pursuing diplomatic talks. Recent drone shootdowns escalate tensions as diplomatic summit approaches.

item.title: DHS drawdown begins in Minnesota; 700 officers to leave immediately

item.title: New Mexico And Utah Target ‘Homewrecker’ Laws That Protect Cheaters’ Spouses And Kids
item.description: If the Utah legislation succeeds, which it’s on track to do, that will leave only four states with alienation of affection laws on the books.

item.title: House Republicans sue to block Utah congressional map that favors Democrats
item.description: Utah Republicans challenge court-ordered congressional map in federal lawsuit, arguing judge violated Constitution by bypassing legislature's authorit...

item.title: Medical Malpractice Comes Home to Roost in Detransitioner Verdict
item.description: Young people who were victimized by ideology masquerading as medicine are beginning to get justice in our courts.

item.title: Valley Forge Park Preserves A Crucible Of The American Revolution
item.description: Valley Forge is a testament to the dedication of the thousands who sacrificed themselves for liberty, their homeland, and their posterity.

item.title: Trump’s Triumphal Arch Is An Important Rebellion Against Postmodern Thought
item.description: The greatness of neoclassical art and architecture lies not merely in historical memory but in truth. And that's why modernists hate it.

item.title: Congress Could Fix The Entitlement Fraud Problem Overnight But Won’t
item.description: The current major problems of federal budget pressures and health care affordability for all consumers require action.

item.title: GOP must race for new 'big, beautiful bill' to slash costs before midterms, top House Republicans warn
item.description: Republicans say they have just months to move a sweeping package cutting taxes and lowering everyday costs before election-year politics close the win...

item.title: Melania Outfoxes the Haters
item.description: The FLOTUS documentary doubles as news and redemption.

item.title: The ‘Kardashian Kurse’ and a Jurassic Park reunion are among the Super Bowl commercials planned for this year
item.description: Space sold for an average of $8 million per 30-second unit, but a handful of spots sold for $10 million-plus, a record, said NBC VP Peter Lazarus.

item.title: The ‘Stolen Land’ Charge Ignores Most of Human History
item.description: If we are guilty of ‘stealing land,’ so is nearly everyone else in history, including Native Americans.

item.title: Federal Reserve governor Stephen Miran steps down from White House post

item.title: Something broke in the economy in 2023 that explains why so many people are miserable about it, New York Fed says
item.description: Higher-income Americans and those with college degrees have ramped up their spending more quickly in the past three years than other consumers.

item.title: Why Are So Many Nurses Wishing Harm To Their Political Opponents?
item.description: Too many Americans cleave to the idea that if someone works in caregiving, they must be trustworthy.

item.title: Trump hit with $16 billion lawsuit for move to cripple New York metro area rail tunnel
